channel.title: About on Zekai Lu (陆泽凯)
channel.description: Recent content in About on Zekai Lu (陆泽凯)

item.title: About
item.description: ABOUT ME Zekai Lu(陆泽凯) is a social science researcher who is currently an MA(thesis-based) student in the Department of Sociology at McGill University. His areas of interest include medical sociology, social psychology and computational sociology.Zekai hopes to focus on the field of medical sociology in his graduate research. Zekai has already published many works on some English and Chinese journal. Zekai’s favourite poem is by Du Fu.This poem depicts a magnificent scene in the transition zone between the Tibetan plateau and the Chengdu plain

item.title: Contact
